import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; // import Properties from "../pages/Properties"; import Navigation from "../components/Navigation"; import "../styles/pages/about.scss"; const About = () => { return (

About us

Welcome to E-Smart Rentals Charlotte, your premier provider of short-term housing solutions in Charlotte, North Carolina. We understand that finding the perfect place to call home, even for a short period of time, can be a daunting task. That's why we've made it our mission to provide you with a wide selection of fully furnished and beautifully appointed properties to choose from.


Our properties range from cozy apartments to spacious houses, and all of them are located in some of the most desirable neighborhoods in Charlotte. Whether you're relocating for work, taking a temporary assignment, or just need a place to stay while you're in town for a visit, we have the perfect property for you.


All of our properties are fully equipped and ready for you to move in. They come with everything you need to feel at home, including comfortable furnishings, linens, and fully stocked kitchens. We also provide complimentary WiFi and cable, so you can stay connected during your stay.


We pride ourselves on providing exceptional customer service, and our team is dedicated to ensuring that your stay with us is as comfortable and stress-free as possible. Whether you need assistance with finding the perfect property, have a question about one of our properties or need help during your stay, our team is here to help.


We are excited to welcome you to Charlotte and to make your short-term stay as enjoyable as possible. Browse our available properties today and book your stay with us. We look forward to hosting you soon!


Check our properties
); }; export default About;
